plot: One man portrays twenty real-life military service members - many gay, others straight - revealing the stories of those silenced by the military's controversial "don't ask, don't tell" policy.
title: Don't Ask, Don't Tell
plot_es: One man portrays twenty real-life military service members - many gay, others straight - revealing the stories of those silenced by the military's controversial "don't ask, don't tell" policy.
plot_en: One man portrays twenty real-life military service members - many gay, others straight - revealing the stories of those silenced by the military's controversial "don't ask, don't tell" policy.
